sounds: You will pay for imprisoning me here.
name: Avalanche (Creature)
behaviour: Fight to dead in close combat.
strategy:
Sorcerers and Druids: use [[Mana Shield]] and [[Energy Strike]] or run in circles shooting [[SD]]s or [[HMM]]s.
Knight: Keep diagonal to take less damage, use [[Exori]] to kill faster.
Paladins: Run in circles or if you have good shielding do the same as a Knight.
